description:
Don’t let the cold get to you. Made from an incredibly soft merino wool jersey, it’s no surprise the 200 Oasis leggings are Icebreaker’s best selling base layer. Breathable and warm, these leggings are great foundation for your cold weather layers. A geometric snowflake design adds a bit of flair to your layering.

  • Merino wool naturally regulates your body’s temperature and resists odour
  • 200 weight merino is on the heavier side of lightweight material and is perfect for those who find traditional lightweight base layers a little too cold
  • Gusseted crotch offers improved mobility
  • Flatlock seams are gentle on sensitive skin
  • Slim fit hugs your body and layers easily
name: icebreaker Merino 200 Oasis Leggings First Snow - Men's
